info.name: Youtube - Glassmorphism for Search bar
info.description:
Apply the modern style "glass-morphism" into the list of searches results.
-
Visit me in http://quangdd.com | Thank you for installing my theme ^^
Don't be shy to report the bug /issue to me in Comment /Email: quangdd98@gmail.com
info.additionalInfo:
Change log:

Updated in v1.2 (Jun 05, 2023):
Fix some bugs

Updated in v1.1 (Apr 05, 2023):
Remove code round corner (already in the new Youtube interface), and keep Glass-morphism design of search and fix some bug with new youtube css code.

Updated in v1.0 (Aug 08, 2022):
Apply round corner, and Glass-morphism design into the list of searches results.
